name: Pharris Media
overview:
Pharris Media represents blue-chip companies in their search for, and activation of sponsorship programs on a local, regional and national level.

They also represent the venues, organizations, teams, and individuals who are looking for sponsors to provide financial and in-kind support of their various endeavors.

There specialty is in pairing these two entities in meaningful and viable relationships that enable both parties to realize their goals.

Pharris Media founder Patrick Pharris, has developed, sold and activated sponsorship programs worth more than $100-million. There services have been provided to General Motors, Sprint, Monster Energy Drink, Paramount Parks, Harrahâ€™s Entertainment, Princess Cruises, the rock band Linkin Park and countless others. The media relations campaigns we have created and implemented to support these programs have generated more than 2-billion media impressions and earned dozens of prestigious national and regional industry awards.
